original_title: Lucia In The Sky With Traffic Lights
overview: "The film tells the story of a being who only has a corporeal existence, an object-being used to satisfy needs and wants." On the screen, LÃºcia preserves only a distant look that hides cries, fears and outbursts. is always ostracized and silenced by the sexist society that at no time considers her opinion, wishes and desires.Lucia is the silent report of the woman coupled with a role or function without the right to be, to think or to express opinions. BUALA
title: Lucia In The Sky With Traffic Lights
